faq.question: Are these original branded watches?
faq.answer: No, these are high-quality replica (first copy) watches. They look and feel like the original but are not manufactured by the original brand.

faq.question: What is the quality of these watches?
faq.answer: We offer premium first-copy watches, which closely resemble the originals in design, weight, and finishing. They are durable and stylish for everyday use.

faq.question: Do these watches come with a warranty?
faq.answer: Since these are replica watches, brand warranties do not apply. However, we offer a 1-year Machine Warrany guarantee for manufacturing defects

faq.question: Can I return or exchange the watch?
faq.answer: We do not offer returns. However, we do have a 10-day exchange policy. If there is any manufacturer defect, you can request an exchange within 10 days of delivery. Please ensure the product is unused and in its original packaging when requesting an exchange.

faq.question: How can I place an order?
faq.answer: Simply click the WhatsApp Inquiry button on the product page, and our team will assist you in placing your order and answering any questions.

faq.question: What if I receive a damaged product?
faq.answer: If you receive a damaged product, please contact us within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damage. We will arrange for a replacement.

faq.question: Is Cash on Delivery (COD) available?
faq.answer: Yes, Cash on Delivery (COD) is available. To confirm your order, a 200 courier charge must be paid in advance. This amount is standard and non-refundable.
